startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of page sources to crawl. Use objects like { "url": "https://..." }.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max requests
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Upper bound for total requests in a single run.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum parallel pages to open at once.

maxRequestsPerMinute.title: Throttle (requests/min)
maxRequestsPerMinute.description: Rate limit to be polite and reduce blocks.

useProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useProxy.description: Toggle to route traffic via Apify Proxy.

proxyGroups.title: Proxy groups
proxyGroups.description: Optional Apify proxy groups (e.g., SHADER, BUYPROXIES94952).

selectors.title: CSS selectors
selectors.description: Configure CSS selectors for fields you want to extract.

website.description: Selector for the company website link (href).

firebaseEnabled.title: Enable Firebase sync
firebaseEnabled.description: If true, upsert results to Firestore in addition to the dataset.

firebaseCollection.title: Firestore collection
firebaseCollection.description: Firestore collection name for saved documents.

login.description: Configure a simple form-based login step. Only use if the site permits it.

enabled.description: Enable the login step before crawling.

username.description: Login username (use Apify input secret fields for sensitive data).

password.description: Login password (use Apify input secret fields for sensitive data).
